response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which holds immense value and has been meticulously crafted to meet your needs. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, we believe it's worth more than $8,000 to you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am extending an exclusive offer to purchase this product for $12,000.
